text: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

translation.en: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned
translation.id: Maka apabila (siksaan) itu turun di halaman mereka, maka sangat buruklah pagi hari bagi orang-orang yang diperingatkan
